description:
Ok, you can say it, "Dang! That boy is skinnay!"
Tall, thin, and horse hung! Do you like your guys tall and extra lean and hung like a mule? This boy is for you!
I met Ryan when I went back home for a family visit. We talked about doing a project together, but we didn't actually make arrangements for him to come out and do a shoot until many months later.
Ok, so he dropped a few pounds from our first visit, but we went ahead and did the shoot. Fortunately, his video is quite nice, especially when he gets that tool at full mast!
title: Ryan Andrews - Solo
